questions.title: Expressing Opinions
questions.prompt: Your company is considering replacing the cafeteria with quiet study pods. Do you support this change? Explain your opinion with specific reasons and examples.

questions.title: Talking about a Personal Experience

questions.title: Giving Advice
questions.prompt: A friend is choosing between two apartments: one downtown near work but smaller, and one larger outside the city with a longer commute. Which would you recommend and why?

questions.title: Dealing with a Difficult Situation
questions.prompt: Your neighbor plays loud music late at night. Describe the problem and outline a respectful plan to resolve it, including what you would say and any follow-up steps.
